name: Legacy of Erina - Shattered World
description:
This is a small game made in the Devtober.
It's a roguelike-soulslike in a fantasy-post-endtime. Its really hard to beat. I hope you enjoy it. We have a lot of fun to develope and maby we will do some more content.

It's playable and has a finish.

Greetings,

Psychopraktica

Controles:

Walk: WASD

Run: Shift

Roll: Space

Attack: LeftMouse

Strong Attack: RightMouse

Camera Lock: MiddleMouse/Q

Heal: F

Items: Tab

Use: E

Link: (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1nFlgE3rVwH64tVSGD_TXm2E_C3Ikx1CD/view)
